body:
## What’s Changed

## Features & Enhancements

* Upgrade Spring Boot to 2.4.1 and provide Hazelcast 4.0.3 and 4.1 support (#129) @pivovarit

## Dependencies

* Bump spring-data-keyvalue from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 (#144) @dependabot
* Bump spring-data-parent from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 (#143) @dependabot
* Upgrade spring-data to 2.3.3.RELEASE (#125) @pivovarit
* Bump spring-data-keyvalue from 2.3.2.RELEASE to 2.3.3.RELEASE (#124) @dependabot-preview
* Bump spring-data-keyvalue from 2.3.1.RELEASE to 2.3.2.RELEASE (#122) @dependabot-preview
* Bump hazelcast from 4.0.1 to 4.0.2 (#120) @dependabot-preview
* Bump spring-data-keyvalue from 2.2.7.RELEASE to 2.3.1.RELEASE (#118) @dependabot-preview
* Bump spring-data-parent from 2.2.6.RELEASE to 2.2.7.RELEASE (#112) @dependabot-preview
* Bump spring-data-keyvalue from 2.2.6.RELEASE to 2.2.7.RELEASE (#113) @dependabot-preview
* Bump hazelcast from 4.0 to 4.0.1 (#111) @dependabot-preview

## External Contributors

@jawitcher

Special thanks to all contributors! 👏

This document includes the new features, enhancements, and fixed issues for Hazelcast Spring Data release.

## New Features
- geospatial queries support
-  `empty`, `isEmpty`, `notEmpty`, `existsBy`, `distinct` keywords support

## Enhancements
- Hazelcast 3.12.6 support

## Fixes
None.

## Known Issues
None.

This document includes the new features, enhancements, and fixed issues for Hazelcast Spring Data release.

## New Features
None.

## Enhancements
None.

## Fixes
spring-boot 2.2 compatibility fix https://github.com/hazelcast/spring-data-hazelcast/pull/56

## Known Issues
None.

This document includes the new features, enhancements, and fixed issues for **Hazelcast Spring Data** release.

# New Features

None.

# Enhancements

None.

# Fixes

- Fix bug with rearrange when parameters include special types (e.g. Pageable)  (#55)

# Known Issues

None.

# Enhancements

None.

# Fixes

# Known Issues

None.

This document includes the new features, enhancements, and fixed issues for **Hazelcast Spring Data** release.

# New Features

None.

# Enhancements

- Compatibility with Spring Data 2.1

# Fixes

None.

# Known Issues

None.

This document includes the new features, enhancements, and fixed issues for **Hazelcast Spring-Data 2.0** release.

# New Features

- Support for Spring Data 2.0

# Enhancements

- Improve 'deleteBy' to delete multiple elements (not only the first one) (#28)
- Remove default Hazelcast instance name (#41)
- Simplify Hazelcast configuration (only 'HazelcastInstance' bean has to be defined) (#11)

# Fixes

- Fix 'orderedBy' (#45)


# Known Issues

None.

This document includes the new features, enhancements, and fixed issues for **Hazelcast Spring-Data 1.2.1** release.

# New Features

There are no new features for this release.

# Enhancements

There are no enhancements for this release.

# Fixes

- Duplicate key exception on Repository.save(T) (#18)
- NPE if @Id omitted (#13)
- NullPointerException when using Query annotation (#34)

# Known Issues

None.

This document includes the new features, enhancements, and fixed issues for **Hazelcast Spring-Data 1.2.0** release.

# New Features

There are no new features for this release.

# Enhancements

- Implementation of missing query keywords. [[#8]](https://github.com/hazelcast/spring-data-hazelcast/issues/8)

# Fixes

There are no fixes for this release.

# Known Issues

None.

This document includes the new features, enhancements, and fixed issues for Hazelcast Spring-Data 1.1.1 release.

# Enhancements

HazelcastInstance. [[#29]](https://github.com/hazelcast/spring-data-hazelcast/pull/29)

There are no fixes for this release.

# Known Issues

None.
